verses.verse: The word<WH1697> which came unto Jeremiah<WH3414> from the Lord<WH3068>, when king<WH4428> Zedekiah<WH6667> sent<WH7971> unto him Pashur<WH6583> the son<WH1121> of Melchiah<WH4441>, and Zephaniah<WH6846> the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah<WH4641> the priest<WH3548>, saying<WH559>,

Inquire<WH1875>, I pray you<WH3068>, of the Lord for us<WH1157>; for Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> makes war<WH3898> against us<WH3068>; if so be that the Lord will deal<WH6213> with us according to all his wondrous works<WH6381>, that he may go up from us<WH5927>.
Then said<WH559> Jeremiah<WH3414> unto them<WH559>, Thus shall you say to Zedekiah<WH6667>:

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>; Behold<WH5437>, I will turn back the weapons<WH3627> of war<WH4421> that are in your hands<WH3027>, with which you fight<WH3898> against the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and against the Chaldeans<WH3778>, which besiege<WH6696> you outside<WH2351> the walls<WH2346>, and I will assemble<WH622> them into the midst<WH8432> of this city<WH5892>.

And I myself will fight<WH3898> against you with a outstretched<WH5186> hand<WH3027> and with a strong<WH2389> arm<WH2220>, even in anger<WH639>, and in fury<WH2534>, and in great<WH1419> wrath<WH7110>.
And I will strike<WH5221> the inhabitants<WH3427> of this city<WH5892>, both man<WH120> and animal<WH929>: they shall die<WH4191> of a great<WH1419> pestilence<WH1698>.

And afterward<WH310>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>, I will deliver<WH5414> Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, and his servants<WH5650>, and the people<WH5971>, and such as are left<WH7604> in this city<WH5892> from the pestilence<WH1698>, from the sword<WH2719>, and from the famine<WH7458>, into the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and into the hand<WH3027> of their enemies<WH341>, and into the hand<WH3027> of those that seek<WH1245> their life<WH5315>: and he shall strike<WH5221> them with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>; he shall not spare<WH2347> them<WH2550>, neither have pity, nor have mercy<WH7355>.
And unto this people<WH5971> you shall say<WH559>, Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>; Behold<WH5414>, I set before<WH6440> you the way<WH1870> of life<WH2416>, and the way<WH1870> of death<WH4194>.

He that stays<WH3427> in this city<WH5892> shall die<WH4191> by the sword<WH2719>, and by the famine<WH7458>, and by the pestilence<WH1698>: but he that goes out<WH3318>, and falls<WH5307> to the Chaldeans<WH3778> that besiege<WH6696> you<WH2421>, he shall live, and his life<WH5315> shall be unto him for a prey<WH7998>.

For I have set<WH7760> my face<WH6440> against this city<WH5892> for evil<WH7451>, and not for good<WH2896>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>: it shall be given<WH5414> into the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and he shall burn<WH8313> it with fire<WH784>.
And touching the house<WH1004> of the king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, say<WH8085>, Hear you the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068>;

O house<WH1004> of David<WH1732>, thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH3068>; Execute<WH1777> judgment<WH4941> in the morning<WH1242>, and deliver<WH5337> him that is spoiled<WH1497> out of the hand<WH3027> of the oppressor<WH6231>, lest my fury<WH2534> go out<WH3318> like fire<WH784>, and burn<WH1197> that none can quench<WH3518> it<WH6440>, because of the evil<WH7455> of your doings<WH4611>.

Behold<WH3427>, I am against you, O inhabitant of the valley<WH6010>, and rock<WH6697> of the plain<WH4334>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>; which say<WH559>, Who shall come down<WH5181> against us<WH935>? or who shall enter into our habitations<WH4585>?

But I will punish<WH6485> you according to the fruit<WH6529> of your doings<WH4611>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH3068>: and I will kindle<WH3341> a fire<WH784> in the forest<WH3293> there<WH398>, and it shall devour all things round about it<WH5439>.
